divs: sighting detailswhite rectangular object over co front range ~20 degrees wsw of centennial co; impression similar to viewing the driver's side of an 18-wheel box except with curved right & left ends. though *much* larger since it was viewed from appx 11 miles and clearly silhouetted against a mountain ridge. oddly, it threw a white reflection below and behind rather than a shadow. took two cell phone photos, and returned 45 minutes later with a nikon w\ zoom lens to capture a better photo; however at that time it was no longer visible. date\time: oct 2, 2013, 2:42pm. can provide precise viewing location to within 1 foot, and object location within several meters since i took reliable (experienced) mountaineering alignments.
Summary: white object over CO Front Range
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Centennial
There were no other sightings in Centennial on or around October 2nd 2013
